answers.answer: It could be big baby or extra fluid.
Have u been tested for diabetes that can cause large baby or maybe just extra fluid

Oh my god finally someone on the same boat as me. I really felt soo alone N confused with al this your measuring big bussiness. I have been measurin big since 26weeks I was measurin 28weeks an at 32 weeks which was my lasy appointment I was measuring at 35weeks. Atleast they are sending you for a scan they keep tellin me its my weight an she couldnt even find the babies head. I pass my diabetes test which I wanna retake...truest me the ultrasound will put yu at ease hun.. Goodluck to both of us.

Yes the glucose test was the test for diabetes which was normal. Haliwali that ultrasound will definitely put me at ease.  I just want to be sure my baby isn't to big or that my due date isn't wrong. I'm going to eat more veggies and fruits to make sure its not what I'm eating. I don't over eat but I tend to eat a lot of the same things. I do drink a lot of water so I very rarely drink sodas or juices. At this point I have to wait for the call about a date for the ultrasound.

Well my doctor is starting to make me think she is off. I did not need this ultrasound. The baby is only 3 pounds and 3 ounces. I'm so glad cause I was thinking about having to push out her big body but now I need to question my doctor to see if she is crazy. Lol she probably just didn't take the measurement right.

question: My due date is march 31st. My doctor said I was measuring 35 weeks at 30. She is sending me for an ultrasound but I can't imagine my daughter being that big already. What else could that mean? My health is good and my weight gain had been normal so I don't think its what I'm eating. Anyone else measuring big?
title: 30 weeks baby measuring 35 weeks
